engrams.name: Beer Jar
engrams.description: Mmmmm.

engrams.name: Beer Liquid
engrams.description: Put it in a glass jar to drink it!

engrams.name: Cooked Fish Meat
engrams.description: Sates your hunger SLIGHTLY, and provides health while being digested. Wild carnivores will eat it, but prefer raw meat.

engrams.name: Cooked Lamb Chop
engrams.description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested. More effective than prime meat. Wild carnivores LOVE this meat!

engrams.name: Cooked Meat
engrams.description: Sates your hunger and provides health while being digested. Wild carnivores will eat it, but prefer raw meat.

engrams.name: Cooked Prime Fish Meat
engrams.description: Sates your hunger SLIGHTLY, and provides health while being digested. More effective than normal meat. Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

engrams.name: Cooked Prime Meat
engrams.description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested. More effective than normal meat. Wild Carnivores like this meat a lot.

engrams.name: Charcoal
engrams.description: Created by burning wood.

engrams.name: Boulder
engrams.description: Massive rock with metal spikes. Can only be used in a Catapult Turret.

engrams.name: Bug Repellant
engrams.description: This gnarly paste makes you nearly invisible to bugs. Just don't attack them, and they'll ignore you! Effect lasts 10 minutes.

engrams.name: Lesser Antidote
engrams.description: Cures Lesser Afflictions!

engrams.name: Narcotic
engrams.description: Increases your health, but puts you to sleep.

engrams.name: Stimulant
engrams.description: Keeps you awake, but dehydrates you.

engrams.name: Absorbent Substrate
engrams.description: This sticky compound excels at absorbing other chemicals.

engrams.name: Cementing Paste
engrams.description: Paste created at Mortar and Pestle.

engrams.name: Gunpowder
engrams.description: A powerful propellant. Necessary for any firearm or explosive.

engrams.name: Sparkpowder
engrams.description: Created by grinding flint with stone in a Mortar and Pestle.

engrams.name: Fertilizer
engrams.description: A fertilizer high in nitrogen. Use this to help your crops grow.

engrams.name: Battle Tartare
engrams.description: Only eat this dish when you intend to go into a brawl. It causes pain and stress to your body, but grants you almost supernatural strength, speed, and resilience. Warning: This concoction can be habit forming.

engrams.name: Broth of Enlightenment
engrams.description: A single sip of this incredible broth will expand your mind and broaden your horizons, granting greatly increased experience gain for a brief time.

engrams.name: Calien Soup
engrams.description: This simple vegetarian dish refreshes you body like an oasis. Helps keep you stay hydrated and feel cool.

engrams.name: Enduro Stew
engrams.description: This hearty dish is like a workout in the form of a meal. You will find yourself hitting harder and running longer after eating this.

engrams.name: Energy Brew
engrams.description: his brew doesn't have any nutritional value, but fills your stamina.

engrams.name: Focal Chili
engrams.description: This filling dish is full of nutritional energy. Consume it to gain increased crafting speed, and gain increased movement speed. Effect lasts 15 minutes.

engrams.name: Fria Curry
engrams.description: his spicy vegetarian dish fills the body with a comfortable warmth. It controls your appetite while helping you ignore cold.

engrams.name: Lazarus Chowder
engrams.description: This creamy dish improves the body's natural constitution. You will recover from injury more quickly after eating this, and your body will need less oxygen.

engrams.name: Medical Brew
engrams.description: This brew doesn't have any nutritional value, but it promotes healing.

engrams.name: Mindwipe Tonic
engrams.description: When consumed, this tonic causes neural overload. Synapses fire off too quickly resulting in damage to the memory centers of the brain related to construction. Warning: this concoction may cause temporary memory loss, and resetting of Engrams.

engrams.name: Shadow Steak Saute
engrams.description: Only eat this dish in the dark. It causes the light receptors in your eyes to become hyperactive, improves your hand-eye coordination, and allows your body to ignore extreme temperatures. Warning: this concoction can be habit-forming.

engrams.name: Sweet Vegetable Cake
engrams.description: A sappy-sweet vegetable cake which Herbivores find delicious, which will be automatically eaten when needed for healing. Alas, humans and carnivores tend to find its taste repugnant.

composition.name: Cooked Meat, Cooked Fish Meat, or Cooked Meat Jerky

engrams.name: Exceptional Kibble
engrams.description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many extra large creatures. Containing only the finest natural ingredients, it provides pets with the balanced nutrition they need. And with a taste they can't resist, they'll warm up to you in no time! Not intended for human consumption.

engrams.name: Extraordinary Kibble
engrams.description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many exotic creatures. Containing only the finest natural ingredients, it provides pets with the balanced nutrition they need. And with a taste they can't resist, they'll warm up to you in no time! Not intended for human consumption.

engrams.name: Regular Kibble

Not intended for human consumption.

engrams.name: Charcoal
engrams.description: Created by burning wood.

engrams.name: Soap
engrams.description: Scrubs dye and paint off items and structures!

engrams.name: Heavy Miner's Helmet
engrams.description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

engrams.name: Gas Mask
engrams.description: Protects the wearer against various airborne poisons.

engrams.name: Night Vision Goggles
engrams.description: Effortlessly see in the dark, though beware blindingly bright light sources!

engrams.name: Riot Boots
engrams.description: Provides heavy physical protection and reduced physical torpor, but provides almost no protection from the elements.

engrams.name: Riot Chestpiece
engrams.description: Provides heavy physical protection and reduced physical torpor, but provides almost no protection from the elements.

engrams.name: Riot Gauntlets
engrams.description: Provides heavy physical protection and reduced physical torpor, but provides almost no protection from the elements.

engrams.name: Riot Helmet
engrams.description: Provides heavy physical protection and reduced physical torpor, but provides almost no protection from the elements.

engrams.name: Riot Leggings
engrams.description: Provides heavy physical protection and reduced physical torpor, but provides almost no protection from the elements.

engrams.name: SCUBA Flippers
engrams.description: These flippers are firm, but flexible. Wearing them increases swim speed, but decreases walking speed.

engrams.name: SCUBA Leggings
engrams.description: Provides little defense, but tremendous hypothermal insulation, specifically when underwater.

engrams.name: SCUBA Mask
engrams.description: Connects to a SCUBA Tank, allowing the wearer to breathe underwater for as long as the tank has oxygen.

engrams.name: SCUBA Tank
engrams.description: A tank that's filled with Oxygen. Used to temporarily breathe underwater.

engrams.name: Riot Shield
engrams.description: A metal-framed shield reinforced with polymer and crystal. Absorbs damage from the front when activated.

engrams.name: Electronics
engrams.description: This multipurpose computer chip can be used to create electronic devices.

engrams.name: Polymer
engrams.description: These incredibly strong, lightweight plates can be shaped and then heat treated into casings for anything.

engrams.name: Canteen
engrams.description: Safely carries a sizable amount of water, and is reasonably lightweight.

engrams.name: Motorboat
engrams.description: A floating metal platform that you can pilot across the water, requires gasoline to power its motor. Can support the weight of structures and be built on.

engrams.name: Spray Painter
engrams.description: Apply a dye to this, then shoot it at structures to paint them. Hold Alt Fire + Hotkey Number to set painting region.

engrams.name: GPS
engrams.description: Detects strange energy from the three Obelisks to triangulate your exact location on the island.

engrams.name: Transponder Node
engrams.description: Can be attached to living Creatures to track their location.

engrams.name: Transponder Tracker
engrams.description: Uses strange energy from the three Obelisks to triangulate all Transponder Nodes on the specified frequency.

engrams.name: Bunk Bed
engrams.description: This modern bunk-style bed has two mattresses, and a high thread count. Acts as a respawn point for you and your tribe with half cooldown time.

engrams.name: Industrial Cooker
engrams.description: Burns Gasoline to cook large quantities of food quickly. Put various ingredients in this to make soups, stews, and dyes.

engrams.name: Industrial Grill
engrams.description: Perfect for cooking meat in bulk, staying warm, and providing light. Powered by Gasoline.

engrams.name: Chemistry Bench
engrams.description: Place materials in this to transmute chemical substances with extreme efficiency!

engrams.name: Industrial Forge
engrams.description: Refines resources in bulk. Powered by gasoline.

engrams.name: Industrial Grinder
engrams.description: Grind up crafted items and certain resources!

engrams.name: Homing Underwater Mine
engrams.description: Place this underwater to create an explosive trap that floats, homes, explodes when touched.

engrams.name: Air Conditioner
engrams.description: Requires electricity to run. Provides insulation from both the heat and the cold to an area.

engrams.name: Lamppost
engrams.description: Requires electricity to activate. Lights an area without adding much heat.

engrams.name: Omnidirectional Lamppost
engrams.description: Requires electricity to activate. Lights an area without adding much heat.

engrams.name: Refrigerator
engrams.description: Requires electricity to run. Keeps perishables from spoiling for a long time.

engrams.name: Remote Keypad
engrams.description: Allows remote access to multiple doors and/or lights.

engrams.name: Electrical Cable - Inclined
engrams.description: An inclined cable for transmitting electricity up and down hills.

engrams.name: Electrical Cable - Intersection
engrams.description: A plus-shaped intersection for a power grid, used for splitting one power cable into three.

engrams.name: Electrical Cable - Straight
engrams.description: A straight cable, used for transmitting electricity across land.

engrams.name: Electrical Cable - Vertical
engrams.description: A vertical cable for transmitting electricity up and down cliffs.

engrams.name: Electrical Generator
engrams.description: A large machine that converts gasoline into electricity.

engrams.name: Electrical Outlet
engrams.description: An outlet for an electrical grid. When connected to a generator via cables, this provides power to all nearby devices that use electricity.

engrams.name: Auto Turret
engrams.description: Requires electricity to run. Consumes bullets while firing. Can be configured to automatically attack hostiles within range.

engrams.name: Heavy Auto Turret
engrams.description: Requires electricity to run. Provides increased firepower, but consumes FOUR bullets while firing. Can be configured to automatically attack hostiles within range.

engrams.name: Elevator Track
engrams.description: Attach an Elevator Platform to these to complete an elevator!

engrams.name: Large Elevator Platform
engrams.description: Attach to an Elevator Track to carry a large amount of weight.

engrams.name: Medium Elevator Platform
engrams.description: Attach to an Elevator Track to carry a medium amount of weight.

engrams.name: Small Elevator Platform
engrams.description: Attach to an Elevator Track to carry a small amount of weight.

engrams.name: Minigun Turret
engrams.description: Mount this to fire a hail of Advanced Rifle Bullets at your enemies. Powered by the rider.

engrams.name: Rocket Turret
engrams.description: Mount this to fire Rockets at your enemies. Powered by the rider.

engrams.name: Advanced Bullet
engrams.description: A small-caliber modern bullet, primarily used with fabricated handguns.

engrams.name: Advanced Rifle Bullet
engrams.description: Primarily used with fabricated rifles.

engrams.name: Advanced Sniper Bullet
engrams.description: A high-caliber modern bullet, primarily used with fabricated sniper rifles

engrams.name: C4 Charge
engrams.description: This advanced explosive can annihilate structures.

engrams.name: Metal Arrow
engrams.description: An armor-and-hide piercing metal arrow.

engrams.name: Pheromone Dart
engrams.description: A dart full of refined Ammonite chemicals, inject on a target to enrage nearby wild creatures. For use in a Longneck Rifle. Can not be used with attachments.

engrams.name: Rocket Propelled Grenade
engrams.description: A small but powerful explosive, primarily used with rocket launchers.

engrams.name: Shocking Tranquilizer Dart
engrams.description: A doubly potent dart full of refined Cnidaria toxin, which also shocks humans. For use in a Longneck Rifle. Can not be used with attachments.

engrams.name: Flashlight Attachment
engrams.description: This flashlight sheds light out in a wide area, but makes you easier to see too. Attach this to a supporting weapon to shine light from a weapon.

engrams.name: Holo-Scope Attachment
engrams.description: This advanced scope can tell friends from strangers. Attach this to a supporting weapon to gain more accurate aiming.

engrams.name: Laser Attachment
engrams.description: This advanced aiming device places a red dot where the weapon is pointed. Attach this to a supporting weapon to add a laser sight.

engrams.name: C4 Remote Detonator
engrams.description: This device uses radio waves to detonate all primed C4 packages on the same frequency.

engrams.name: Poison Grenade
engrams.description: Releases narcotic smoke to knock out anything in the area - only affects humans. Pulling the pin starts a 2.5 second timer to the gas release.

engrams.name: Assault Rifle
engrams.description: The fastest way to fill a target with holes.

engrams.name: Fabricated Pistol
engrams.description: This advanced pistol gains a high rate of fire and a large magazine size by sacrificing stopping power.

engrams.name: Fabricated Sniper Rifle
engrams.description: This semi-automatic rifle has less punch than a Longneck Rifle, but can be fired much more rapidly.

engrams.name: Pump-Action Shotgun
engrams.description: Powerful up close, but less reliable with range. Can fire six rounds before reloading.

engrams.name: Rocket Launcher
engrams.description: Mankind's ultimate portable killing device.

engrams.name: Electric Prod
engrams.description: Powerful stunning weapon, but can only be used for a single strike before recharge is needed.

engrams.name: Metal Dinosaur Gate
engrams.description: A large metal gate that can be used with a Gateway to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Metal Dinosaur Gateway
engrams.description: A large metal gateway that can be used with a gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Metal Door
engrams.description: A stable metal-plated concrete door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.

engrams.name: Metal Doorframe
engrams.description: A metal-plated concrete wall that provides entrance to a structure.

engrams.name: Metal Fence Foundation
engrams.description: This very strong, narrow foundation is used to build walls around an area.

engrams.name: Metal Foundation
engrams.description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area. This one is made from sturdy metal-plated concrete.

engrams.name: Metal Hatchframe
engrams.description: This metal-plated concrete ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

engrams.name: Metal Ladder
engrams.description: A simple metal ladder used to climb up or down tall structures. Can also be used to extend existing ladders.

engrams.name: Metal Pillar
engrams.description: This metal-plated concrete pillar adds structural integrity to the area it is built under. Can also act as stilts for building on inclines.

engrams.name: Metal Railing
engrams.description: A metal-plated concrete railing that acts a a simple barrier to prevent people from falling.

engrams.name: Metal Ramp
engrams.description: An inclined metal-plated concrete floor for travelling up or down levels. Can also be used to make an angled roof.

engrams.name: Metal Spike Wall
engrams.description: These incredibly sharp metal spikes are dangerous to any that touch them. Large creatures take more damage.

engrams.name: Metal Staircase
engrams.description: A metal spiral staircase, useful in constructing multi-level buildings.

engrams.name: Metal Trapdoor
engrams.description: This metal-plated concrete slab can be used to secure hatches.

engrams.name: Metal Tree Platform
engrams.description: Attaches to a large tree, enabling you to build on it.

engrams.name: Metal Wall
engrams.description: A metal-plated concrete wall that insulates the inside from the outside and separates rooms.

engrams.name: Metal Window
engrams.description: Metal plates on hinges that cover windows to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

engrams.name: Metal Windowframe
engrams.description: A metal-plated concrete wall, with a hole for a window.

engrams.name: Primitive Cannon
engrams.description: A powerful, heavy weapon of war, capable of demolishing heavily reinforced structures.

engrams.name: Sloped Metal Roof
engrams.description: An inclined metal roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

engrams.name: Sloped Metal Wall Left
engrams.description: A sturdy metal sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Sloped Metal Wall Right
engrams.description: A sturdy metal sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Wall Torch
engrams.description: A torch on a metal connector that lights and warms the immediate area. Must be placed on a wall.

engrams.name: Metal Billboard
engrams.description: A large metal billboard for landmark navigation or relaying messages.

engrams.name: Metal Sign
engrams.description: A small metal sign for landmark navigation or relaying messages.

engrams.name: Metal Wall Sign
engrams.description: A simple metal wall sign for basic messages, requires attaching to a wall.

engrams.name: Tree Sap Tap
engrams.description: Attach this to a large tree to tap its sap over time.

engrams.name: Trophy Base
engrams.description: Provides the base upon which you can place a Trophy!

engrams.name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Inclined
engrams.description: An inclined metal pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water up and down hills.

engrams.name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Intake
engrams.description: The metal intake for an irrigation network that transports water over land.

engrams.name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Intersection
engrams.description: A plus-shaped metal intersection for an irrigation network, used for splitting one water source into three.

engrams.name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Straight
engrams.description: A straight metal pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water across land.

engrams.name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Tap
engrams.description: This metal tap allows access to the water in an irrigation network. Can refill containers, irrigate crop plots, or provide a refreshing drink.

engrams.name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Vertical
engrams.description: A vertical metal pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water up and down cliffs.

engrams.name: Metal Water Reservoir
engrams.description: Attach this to pipes to store rain, irrigation, or manually deposited water for later use. Will automatically irrigate nearby crops if attached to a tap. Stores a large amount of water!

engrams.name: Behemoth Reinforced Dinosaur Gate
engrams.description: A large, reinforced wooden gate that can be used with a Behemoth Gateway to keep dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Behemoth Stone Dinosaur Gateway
engrams.description: A massive brick-and-mortar gateway that can be used for penning up huge dinosaurs.

engrams.name: Giant Reinforced Trapdoor
engrams.description: A large reinforced ceiling gate that can be used with a Gateway to most keep dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Giant Stone Hatchframe
engrams.description: This Giant Stone ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

engrams.name: Wooden Tree Platform
engrams.description: Attaches to a large tree, enabling you to build on it.

engrams.name: Cannon Ball
engrams.description: A gigantic ball of heavy metal, capable of demolishing very strong structures.

engrams.name: Chain Bola
engrams.description: A gigantic bola made of metal chain, capable of ensnaring larger creatures. Usable within a Ballista turret.

engrams.name: Grappling Hook
engrams.description: Apply on the Crossbow to grapple onto the environment & other creatures. Primary Fire to "Reel-In", Secondary Fire to "Reel-Out", Crouch to Detach, Jump + Reel-In to Vault-Jump!

engrams.name: Simple Bullet
engrams.description: Primarily used with forged handguns.

engrams.name: Simple Rifle Ammo
engrams.description: An odd bullet and casing, used with forged rifles.

engrams.name: Simple Shotgun Ammo
engrams.description: A few simple bullets in a hide casing, used with forged shotguns.

engrams.name: Spear Bolt
engrams.description: A massive bolt with a cast iron arrowhead. Can only be used in a Ballista Turret or a Harpoon Gun. If it doesn't break, you can recover your ammo.

engrams.name: Tranq Spear Bolt
engrams.description: A massive bolt with a tranq dart mounted on the front. Used as an underwater tranquilizer projectile with the Harpoon Gun. If it doesn't break, you can recover the spear bolt.

engrams.name: Tranquilizer Dart
engrams.description: A potent dart full of tranquilizing poison. For use in a Longneck Rifle. Can not be used with attachments.

engrams.name: Scope Attachment
engrams.description: The carefully shaped crystal lenses in this scope grant the user a telescopic aim when firing. Attach this to a supporting weapon to gain more accurate aiming.

engrams.name: Silencer Attachment
engrams.description: The lubricated materials in this silencer slow the gases released from a gunshot, muffling the sounds. Attach this to a supporting weapon for reduced noise when firing.

engrams.name: Grenade
engrams.description: Pulling the pin starts a 5 second timer to an explosion. Make sure you've thrown it by then.

engrams.name: Improvised Explosive Device
engrams.description: Place two of these near each other to create an explosive trap.

engrams.name: Longneck Rifle
engrams.description: This simple single-shot rifle is highly accurate, but has a long reload time.

engrams.name: Shotgun
engrams.description: Very powerful up close, but less reliable with range.

engrams.name: Simple Pistol
engrams.description: This simple revolver trades accuracy for flexibility.

engrams.name: Lance
engrams.description: Knock your foes off their mounts! Can only be utilized when riding a mount.

engrams.name: Metal Hatchet
engrams.description: A sharp metal hatchet for harvesting wood from trees, stone from rocks, and skin from bodies.

engrams.name: Metal Pick
engrams.description: A sharp metal pick for harvesting metal from mountain rocks, flint from rocks, and meat from bodies.

engrams.name: Metal Sickle
engrams.description: A curved tool ideal for harvesting fiber from seed plants. Also useful for delicately shearing off slices of Prime Fish!

engrams.name: Pike
engrams.description: A powerful weapon tipped with metal. Unlike the spear, it cannot be thrown.

engrams.name: Scissors
engrams.description: Used for cutting hair & other materials!

engrams.name: Metal Sword
engrams.description: The undisputed ruler of short-range combat. Needs a hotter flame to be forged.

engrams.name: Crossbow
engrams.description: Has significantly more power than the Bow, but cannot fire rapidly. Can fire underwater.

engrams.name: Harpoon Launcher
engrams.description: Has tremendous power and speed underwater, but ineffective range out of water. Uses Spear Bolts for ammunition.

engrams.name: Tek Boots
engrams.description: Highly advanced boots capable of absorbing the impact of falling from high distances. Equipping requires learning this Tekgram.

engrams.name: Tek Chestpiece
engrams.description: Highly advanced chestpiece with an integrated jetpack. Equipping requires learning this Tekgram.

engrams.name: Tek Gauntlets
engrams.description: Highly advanced gauntlets that allow the wearer to perform devastating punches. Equipping requires learning this Tekgram.

engrams.name: Tek Helmet
engrams.description: Never get lost again with the Tek Helmets night vision and GPS. Also provides a targeting mode that reveals other characters' positions, and infinite oxygen while underwater. Equipping requires learning this Tekgram.

engrams.name: Tek Leggings
engrams.description: Highly advanced leggings that allow for powerful forward movement. Equipping requires learning this Tekgram.

engrams.name: Element
engrams.description: A strange, highly advanced material humming with energy. It dissolves when transferred across ARKs.

engrams.name: Element Shard
engrams.description: A small chunk of strange, highly advanced material. It dissolves when transferred across ARKs.

engrams.name: Megalodon Tek Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Megalodon with this to ride it. Using requires learning the Tekgram.

engrams.name: Mosasaur Tek Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Mosasaur with this to ride it. Using requires learning the Tekgram.

engrams.name: Rex Tek Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Rex with this to ride it. Using requires learning the Tekgram.

engrams.name: Tapejara Tek Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Tapejara with this to ride it, enabling the rider to fire plasma projectiles. Using requires learning this Tekgram.

engrams.name: Tek Transmitter
engrams.description: Transmits items, Survivors, and creatures to other ARKs! Requires Tek Engram to use.

engrams.name: Tek Forcefield
engrams.description: Generates an impenetrable, expandable spherical shield to keep out enemies. Requires Element to run, and Tek Engram to use.

engrams.name: Tek Generator
engrams.description: Powers Tek Structures and electrical structures wirelessly! Requires Element to run, and Tek Engram to use.

engrams.name: Tek Teleporter
engrams.description: Allows instantaneous traversal between Teleporters! Requires Tek Generator to power, and Element shards & Tek Engram to use.

engrams.name: Behemoth Tek Gate
engrams.description: A large composite Tek gate that can be used with a Behemoth Gateway to allow even the largest creatures in or out.

engrams.name: Behemoth Tek Gateway
engrams.description: A large composite Tek gateway, reinforced with obsidian polymer, that can be used with a Behemoth Gate to allow even the largest creatures in or out.

engrams.name: Cloning Chamber
engrams.description: Enables you to generate clones of your creatures!

engrams.name: Sloped Tek Roof
engrams.description: An inclined tek roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

engrams.name: Sloped Tek Wall Left
engrams.description: A composite Tek sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Sloped Tek Wall Right
engrams.description: A composite Tek sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

engrams.name: Tek Catwalk
engrams.description: A thin walkway for bridging areas together. Made from advanced Tek materials.

engrams.name: Tek Ceiling
engrams.description: An incredibly durable composite Tek ceiling that provides insulation, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

engrams.name: Tek Dinosaur Gate
engrams.description: A large composite Tek gate that can be used with a Gateway to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Tek Dinosaur Gateway
engrams.description: A large composite Tek gateway that can be used with a Gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Tek Door
engrams.description: A stable composite Tek door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.

engrams.name: Tek Doorframe
engrams.description: A composite Tek wall that provides entrance to a structure.

engrams.name: Tek Fence Foundation
engrams.description: This composite Tek foundation is used to build walls around an area.

engrams.name: Tek Foundation
engrams.description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area. This is made from sturdy composite Tek materials.

engrams.name: Tek Hatchframe
engrams.description: This composite Tek ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

engrams.name: Tek Ladder
engrams.description: A composite Tek ladder used to climb up or down tall structures. Can also be used to extend existing ladders.

engrams.name: Tek Pillar
engrams.description: This composite Tek pillar adds structural integrity to the area it is build under. Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

engrams.name: Tek Railing
engrams.description: A composite Tek railing that acts as a simple barrier to prevent people from falling.

engrams.name: Tek Ramp
engrams.description: An inclined composite Tek floor for travelling up or down levels. Can also be used to make an angled roof.

engrams.name: Tek Staircase
engrams.description: A composite Tek spiral staircase, useful in constructing multi-level buildings.

engrams.name: Tek Trapdoor
engrams.description: This composite Tek slab can be used to secure hatches.

engrams.name: Tek Trough
engrams.description: Put food for your nearby pets in this, and they'll automatically eat it when hungry! Can refridgerate [sic] items, so long as it's powered by a Tek Generator!

engrams.name: Tek Turret
engrams.description: Requires Tek Generator power. Consumes Element Shards while firing. Has a variety of smart-targeting configuration options.

engrams.name: Tek Wall
engrams.description: A composite Tek wall that insulates the inside from the outside and separates rooms.

engrams.name: Tek Window
engrams.description: Tek plates that cover windows to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

engrams.name: Tek Windowframe
engrams.description: A composite Tek wall, with a hole for a window.

engrams.name: Vacuum Compartment
engrams.description: Place underwater, power with Tek Generator, and you can live and breath in it!

engrams.name: Vacuum Compartment Moonpool
engrams.description: Place underwater, power with Tek Generator, and you can live and breath in it! Has opening at the bottom for direct swimming access.

engrams.name: Tek Grenade
engrams.description: Sticks to targets with a powerful Tek Explosion after 5 seconds. Equipping requires learning this Tekgram.

engrams.name: Tek Rifle
engrams.description: The fastest way to fill a target with holes. Equipping requires learning this Tekgram.

engrams.name: Access Tek Cave (Alpha)
engrams.description: Access the Tek Case with this.

engrams.name: Access Tek Cave (Beta)
engrams.description: Access the Tek Case with this.

engrams.name: Access Tek Cave (Gamma)
engrams.description: Access the Tek Case with this.
